documents.document: #USER# Maybe this will help you understand the difference between free speech and the cancel culture.... but you knew this already. Playing dumb is so unbecoming in an elected official. #URL#

#USER# #USER# Why do you keep up this charade? You are dividing this country. You think you are punishing Biden, but your pettiness is scorching every aspect of government & tearing the social fabric. Since you can’t be an adult, go to MarALago & stay there. #HASHTAG#

#USER# if you are not heartless & so worried about the debt (suddenly), then revoke the Trump tax cut. Approve the $2000 salve to #HASHTAG# & #HASHTAG# Americans. #HASHTAG# or #HASHTAG# You pick. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# Or maybe where Rudy is buried? He hasn’t been seen since Jan 6!

#USER# Awwww. Cute. Tweeting the family lie of ‘election fraud’. Daddy must be so proud. When’s the next fundraising email coming out? Does your fine print tell donors that you get the $$$ for whatever you want? #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# The facts do not bear you out. You keep telling lies over & over & provoking your supporters to take violent action. You can disagree w the outcome but you must stop lying about the validity of the election. You have proven you are a danger & need to be removed. Or #HASHTAG# now
#USER# Proud Boys aren’t checking Twitter right now. Maybe get your ass out there & plead your case. And don’t forget to ask for donations when you are done. #HASHTAG# #URL#
#USER# #USER# Remove Trump. He broke the law again. You failed to stop him a year ago. Do it now before he does anything else batshit crazy. #URL#

#USER# What?! You haven’t given a damn about the 300,000 Americans who have died and the 1000’s who will die by Jan 20. What makes you think we are buying this #HASHTAG# tweet? You don’t have an empathetic bone in your body. #HASHTAG# & stay there.
#USER# They are fighting a sure losing strategy! For a loser! Give up!!!!!
#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# You do not deserve the protection of Capital police. You invited this violence. Get outside & put your asses on the line & try to stop this anarchy. #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# And what sweeping legislation does #USER# have to address #HASHTAG# ? #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# After all, there are plenty of other planets in the Milky Way that we can move to & destroy, too. #HASHTAG#

#USER# Hey, Ted, let’s just do away with all of those pesky vaccinations! Schools are cesspools of germs already. Let Darwin’s theory of natural selection take over, right? One kid dies from Covid, another from measles. Lots of kids could die from tetanus. But, freedom, right? #HASHTAG#
#USER# Do you think that Republicans don’t live in ‘blue’ states? You probably do. Way to be the uniting president of all Americans! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# If your every waking moment was devoted to saving lives, how come you didn’t implement a national plan of attack back in February or March? Rewriting history is going to be hard on this. You all bungled the response to the pandemic & we are still suffering 10 months later.

#USER# ‘Promising political career’??? In what universe does she live? She has no political career. My favorite video of her is getting shut out of the conversation circle & ignored by female world leaders.

#USER# Jobs like pro sports players? And their owners? Wealthy restaurant owners? Didn’t the airlines start to lay off employees after they got their slice? So happy to see someone get the $. Warms my heart..... #HASHTAG#
#USER# Finally some truth. You did get 75 million votes. Biden got 80. 80 Million. I know you like to play with numbers but 80 is still more than 75. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# Even if this is true, the number of affected ballots isn’t enough to overturn Biden’s win. And, ballot recounts use PAPER to verify results, not the voting machine tabulations. #USER# should be ashamed of this propaganda Trump is being played by all these sycophants

#USER# #USER# Hey, Ben- how do you view #USER# blocking Obama from day one & vowing that he will be a one term President? And I believe he has said the same thing about Biden. Dems have tried to reach across the aisle & got knee capped. Check your victim hood.

#USER# Voters stuck with the devil they know in Congress. We decided you were more than we could stomach after 4 years of chaos at your hands so we voted for Joe Biden & normalcy. 81 million Americans were repulsed by your bad judgement, bad negotiations & narcissistic ways. #HASHTAG#
#USER# #USER# #USER# Gosh thanks for the invite but I had to clean the litter box last night. Sort of the same thing, right? Your shit & cat shit.

#USER# #USER# Yup, everyone is lying. Everyone with education & training & experience are all conspiring against the uninformed, uneducated & people who deliberately follow Trump to trash the economy & subvert Trump’s re-election. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# I totally think he would skip the country if he felt certain SDNY was coming for him Jan 20. He has the means & resources. It will be a few days before the inauguration not the night before. Watch movements of the Trump jet.
Lindsey Graham has had his epiphany today. What a shock!

#USER# #USER# #USER# Hunter wasn’t on the ballot. 80 million voters decided we’d have enough of Trump’s childish antics & voted for Biden. End of the story. Election over. Results certified. Trump is out. Biden is in. #HASHTAG#
#USER# The blackouts have nothing to do with green energy. It has everything to do with preventing massive wildfires. Don’t spread misinformation. It always comes back to bite you in the butt!

#USER# #USER# will do the right thing & accept the EC results. He might have been your lackey these past 4 years but he has no reason to continue to humor you. His political career is dead. His oath to the Constitution will overrule his pledge to you.
#USER# If the event is not about him personally, or he can profit from it in some way, he won’t mention it.....
#USER# Oooohhhhh! Well, that makes everything fine then. #HASHTAG#

#USER# You are a buffoon. SCOTUS already said no once. I’m not a lawyer & even I know Texas has no standing to sue other states. You are a lawyer (allegedly). Chasing an ambulance will get you farther than this #HASHTAG# lawsuit. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# And watching many Pinkie & the Brain cartoons

#USER# Children were separated from their parents by this administration. Those children were rounded up like animals. Their parents were deported wo their children & now those parents are disappearing. This administration made no plans or provisions to reunite these families. 😡😡😡

#USER# Someone had to write those words for him because he really didn’t want to calm the violence. You must have seen the video of him watching the riot unfold on TV screens. He was loving the chaos. He was forced to say those things. How long will you deny this? #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# Those terrorists last week were actively looking for #USER# to HANG him in a gallows they built outside. How can you not be outraged over this and Trump's direct role in inciting this violence? #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# Free yourselves from his chokehold
#USER# This is unjust. You need to stop executions. How can #USER# call itself ‘pro-life’? #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# No, the states don’t want to redo their elections. There is no need. You don’t understand how elections work. You don’t understand how government works. YOU LOST! But you like the fight, don’t you? Watching all these spineless R’s carry your water. You are humiliating them

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# How many times do you have to lose to get a clue? In each & every state that has recounted its ballots, you lost. There is no rigging the election. There is no wide spread fraud. There were 2 candidates & Biden beat you by 7 million votes. Every state has certified these results.

#USER# Just want to remind you that 280,000 Americans have died directly due to your negligence. But let’s keep talking about stealing an election you lost. At least you still have your life. #HASHTAG#

#USER# Fight back??? We HAD election integrity until you bozos took up Trump’s falsehoods about winning. You should have been the adult in the room & told him to can it. Now you have damaged that integrity perhaps forever. 100’s of election experts & officials are right & you are wrong.

#USER# Obama/Biden didn’t have a pandemic playbook in their hands before H1N1 struck. They analyzed what they learned and write the playbook for you. You threw the book away. No question who to trust in this situation & it ain’t you! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# You are so cute when you are defensive. #HASHTAG# These tweets just make you look petty, ignorant, incompetent & desperate. Not exactly the qualities most people want in a president. You might want to rethink this strategy. But you just can’t help yourself, can you? You do you!
#USER# Ummmmm........ they do know that the #USER# can see this, right? #HASHTAG#
#USER# We should just guess how many people are sick . That’s a great plan. #HASHTAG#
More #HASHTAG# from the worst President ever #USER# How could you bungle this too? It’s you, so of course it’s half-assed. More deaths on you personally. #HASHTAG# #URL#

#USER# SCOTUS isn’t going to get involved in a lawsuit by a state trying to force 4 other states to cancel the certified election results. This is a #HASHTAG# lawsuit by any measure all to curry favor with you. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# When will you wake up & accept the results? #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# #USER# Almost 15 million Americans have become infected with covid19 because you didn’t give a shit. You don’t deserve to be president. Give it up! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# Toomey gets it alright. He gets that he took care of himself & his wealthy friends the way he was supposed to. He has not ever been interested in helping Main Street Americans. If you are struggling financially, Toomey suggests you get rich so you don’t suffer any more. #HASHTAG#

#USER# Is that how you negotiate? That’s the worst negotiation I’ve ever witnessed. I thought you were a tough businessman? The Art of the Deal & all? You #HASHTAG# Step aside & let a real president ( #USER# )show you how it’s done!
Where is the National Guard? We’re they mobilized yesterday because we anticipated this? #HASHTAG#

#USER# #USER# #USER# your inauguration today ends 4 years of anxiety, destruction & a deliberate disregard for American values & the Constitution. I am so excited & relieved that you all will be taking the helm at noon TODAY!!! 😊😊😊
We need to understand the tactics being employed by Trump & his sycophants to overturn the election & seize power unlawfully. #URL#

#USER# So, being a loyal VP for 4 years earned you death threats & a noose if the terrorists could find you. Trump was willing to let you be murdered for doing your Constitutional duty. But no 25th Amendment.... #HASHTAG#

#USER# On Jan 6, you said to “count you out” & “enough is enough”. I thought that you were finally free of the Trump chains that bound you these past 4 years. Your stand on impeachment tells me that Jan 6 was just a moment of clarity & now it is gone. #HASHTAG#

Petty & narcissistic- that's you.
Biden is the next president. End of story.

#USER# Definition of Communism 1a : a system in which goods r owned in common & are available to all as needed. b : a theory advocating elimination of private property. 2 capitalized. a : a doctrine based on revolutionary Marxism-Leninism that was the official ideology of the U.S.S.R.

#USER# #USER# You need to come clean with your base and tell them the truth about Trump's lies about fraud. You need to apologize for personally perpetuating the lies about fraud. You owe #USER# as much. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#

#USER# You’re upset the #USER# is ‘not doing his job’? How would you describe the deliberate sabotaging of democracy by #USER# #USER# by obstructing everything? YOU all are not doing your job! #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# #USER# Here’s some history to help you plan next week. #URL#

#USER# #USER# A murderous dictator with nukes & a dictator wanna be. #HASHTAG# #HASHTAG#
#USER# He has been a co-conspirator since day 1 to Trump’s ridiculousness. He allowed this charade of ‘stolen election’ to grow & grow while saying nothing. Hard to believe he is a fine & decent man.

#USER# Well, you are going to make history next week. Will you honor your oath of office to defend the Constitution or will you destroy the Constitution by pulling some stunt to throw the election to Trump? Are you honorable or spineless? High road or the swamp? #HASHTAG#

#USER# I couldn’t tell if he was the comedy relief or for real. He did FINALLY say enough is enough & recognized Biden & Harris as the legitimate President & Vice President. Talk about 11th hour attempt at redemption
#USER# #USER# #USER# Did you buy enough this time for every American?

#USER# Glad you called out those powerful people who were complicit in Trump’s call to overturn the election. You are one of those people. You helped perpetuate the lie about the election. You are no hero. You are a traitor. I wish you had lost your election. #HASHTAG#
#USER# Beautiful! It says so much so succinctly. Good poetry paints a picture for the reader and you nailed it.

#USER# #USER# 80 million voters chose Biden. Get some big girl panties & stop acting like a 6 year old having a temper tantrum because she was picked last for Red Rover. Retaliation impeachment with zero ‘crimes’ is simply a waste of time & money. And Hunter is not an elected official. Geez!
